name: 02-Data Description and Preparation
content:
Data Description and Preparation

Data Description:

The dataset contains transaction-level customer data.

  • Categorical Variables: Gender, Transaction Reason, Job, State, Fraud_Label.
  • Numerical Variables: Amount, City Population, Transaction Frequency.
  • Target Variable: Fraud_Label â†’ 1 (Fraud), 0 (Non-Fraud).
  • Granularity: Each row = individual transaction.

Data Preparation Steps:

  1. Data Cleaning:
  • Handle missing demographic details (e.g., impute Gender or Job).
  • Remove outliers in transaction Amount.
  1. Feature Engineering:
  • Create Transaction_Frequency per customer.
  • Encode categorical variables (Job, State, Transaction Reason).
  • Generate risk ratios (e.g., fraud-to-total transactions per job).
  1. Data Transformation:
  • One-hot encoding for categorical fields.
  • Scaling for high-variance features like Amount and City Population.
  • Partition into Training Dataset and Prediction Dataset.
